task: For a day trader view, obtain both the real-time stock quote and historical daily data for IBM using get_stock_quote and get_time_series_daily tools.
Obtain the company overview and fundamental data for Tesla (TSLA) using the get_company_overview tool.
Calculate the 30-day Simple Moving Average (SMA) for Netflix (NFLX) using daily closing prices with the get_sma tool.
Analyze IBM's business profile for a long-term investment by retrieving its company overview using the get_company_overview tool.
For academic research, aggregate daily time series data for stocks like Apple (AAPL), Microsoft (MSFT), and Amazon (AMZN) to study market trends.
Fetch the 14-day Relative Strength Index (RSI) for Amazon (AMZN) on a daily interval using the get_rsi tool.
Retrieve Oracle's (ORCL) daily time series data and compute its 30-day SMA using closing prices to assess price trends.
Generate an analysis report for Moderna (MRNA) by retrieving its daily time series data and calculating the 14-day RSI to support investment decisions.
Analyze Netflix's (NFLX) longer-term performance by retrieving its weekly RSI using the get_rsi tool.
Perform a technical analysis for Microsoft (MSFT) by comparing its current stock price with its 30-day SMA and 14-day RSI to assess momentum.
Search for stock symbols in the pharmaceutical sector using the keyword 'pharma' with the search_symbol tool to explore investment opportunities.

Conduct market research on biotech companies by first searching for symbols with the keyword 'biotech' using search_symbol, then selecting one to retrieve its company overview using get_company_overview.
Analyze volatility in the tech sector by retrieving daily time series data and computing the RSI for both Apple (AAPL) and Microsoft (MSFT).
Perform an in-depth technical analysis for Amazon (AMZN) by comparing its current stock price with its daily SMA and daily RSI to assess overall performance.
Get the current real-time stock price for Apple (AAPL) using the get_stock_quote tool.
Retrieve the daily time series data for Microsoft (MSFT) with the latest 100 data points using the get_time_series_daily tool.
